column4: you know any way to check my hardware acceleration is on?
glxgears is normally a good sign, or lookin the xorg.log

a windows with some gears are coming, and its rotating,
is it smooth/fast ?
its fast
it's a solid bet that your acceleration is working
sounds good
yes
so where can i disable compiz?
in the desktop effects tab
add it to the boot line of your grub parameters
its grub2, so which is the file?
look in /etc/grub
00_header        10_linux         30_os-prober     README
open the package manager, find the package, click remove, it's that simple
its not working, thats why i asked here in the first place!
